text: Joe Túri (; 18 November 1956 - 30 April 2003) was a Hungarian equestrian. In 1973, he defected to Great Britain, and competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics for the British team. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Hungarian male equestrians Category:British male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Great Britain Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Nagykőrös Category:Road incident deaths in Hungary
title: Joe Túri
